testcase.name: Sign in attempt with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Sign in attempt with invalid email and password Given We are on the Sign in page ... passed in 1.991s When We input a incorrect email ... passed in 0.136s And We input a password ... passed in 0.109s Then The 'Enter a valid email' error is present ... passed in 0.020s And The Sign in button is disabled ... passed in 0.014s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Forgot Password
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Forgot Password Given We are on the Sign in page ... passed in 2.171s When We click the Forgot password link ... passed in 1.274s And We input our accounts email address ... passed in 0.094s And We click the Send request button ... passed in 0.227s Then We get the confirmation that a password reset email was sent ... passed in 3.397s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify that password we input is hidden
Verify that the Keep me signed in box is selected
testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Successful sign in
